name: Terrible Taxi
description:
Terrible Taxi is a video game about a robot chauffeur who tries his best to do his job. 

Put yourself in the wheel of the robot chauffeur who hasn’t quite grasped that he also needs to pick up his passengers. Grab all the coins on the road on the way to the next destination and don’t forget to take the money from the humans who want to get on your chariot (which you forgot to pick up).

Sadly the job isn’t an easy one, the streets are filled with obstacles that the humans have not put away, try to dodge as many as you can on your job to get the best paycheck.

It is your job as a Taxi Driver to try and NOT be terrible. As you move faster and faster throughout the futuristic city you will rake up more and more coins from the people wishing to ride on your chariot but the job gets harder the longer you go. Speed will be your best and worst friend in this game!

Controls

A/Left Arrow - Move Left
D/Right Arrow - Move Right
ESC - Pause
